duties_responsibilities.duty: Experience with stock-based compensation, convertible debt, and other equity-related transactions
Review balance sheets and income statements prepared by the client or FIAB staff
Provide client with technical accounting advice on more complex accounting topics
Ensure financial statements are prepared in accordance with US GAAP and SEC regulations, including newly issued accounting pronouncements
Review and ensure appropriate revenue recognition
Support audits by acting as the interface with external auditors and ensuring the auditors are provided with required data on a timely basis

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance. CPA or MBA preferred
